knowledge_panel.description: castlevania: symphony of the night is an action role-playing game developed and published by konami for the playstation. it was directed and produced by toru hagihara, with koji igarashi acting as assistant director. it is a direct sequel to castlevania: rondo of blood, taking place four years later. wikipedia
